intro.title: CertifyChain
intro.description: Enable schools, businesses, and learners to verify credentials in seconds. Every certificate is hashed, stored, and independently verifiable for full transparency and security.

how.title: Streamlined verification, secure by design
how.description: CertifyChain is built around user trust and end-to-end transparency. From issuance to verification, every record is processed securely on-chain.

step1.title: Collect source data
step1.description: Schools or training centers submit records via secure APIs or the admin console, ensuring accuracy at the source.

step2.title: Hash and anchor on blockchain
step2.description: Data is hashed, signed, and recorded on an immutable ledger, creating a unique technical fingerprint for each credential.

step3.title: Real-time verification
step3.description: Employers or individuals scan a QR or follow a link to check certificate status with instant responses.

item1.title: Tamper-proof verification
item1.description: Every credential has its own signature and hash, preventing edits or duplication.

item2.title: Transparent audit trail
item2.description: 24/7 verification with full access history for easy oversight.

item3.title: Time and cost savings
item3.description: Simplify checks and reduce manual workflows, turning days of verification into seconds.

item4.title: Data security
item4.description: Encrypted personal and institutional data with clear access controls aligned to standards.

lookup.title: Verify documents securely in seconds
lookup.description: Designed for recruiters, HR teams, and students. Enter or scan a code to confirm blockchain-issued credentials.

item1.title: Search by code
item1.description: Enter the unique identifier to view certificate details and issuance info.

item2.title: Smart QR scanning
item2.description: Use mobile or scanner to read QR codes on certificates with one tap.

item3.title: Detailed reports
item3.description: Track update history, related entities, and verification attempts in one dashboard.

partners.title: Building trust with education and hiring ecosystems
partners.description: Trusted by universities, employers, and certifying bodies across the region.

cta.title: Ready to launch trusted verification?
cta.description: CertifyChain tailors onboarding, API setup, and training to your needs.
